current-chamber.#text: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

official-title.#text:
To authorize the appropriation of funds to the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention for
			 conducting or supporting research on firearms safety or gun violence
			 prevention.

.

for the purpose of
